reparation.translation[0].definitions[0]: when you give something to someone or do something for them because you have done something wrong to them in the past
Offenders must make reparation for their crimes through community service.
reparation.translation[1].definitions[0]: payment made to someone for loss, damage etc that someone has caused them in the past
A commission will gather demands for reparations from companies and individuals.
The company has few resources to finance reparation payments.
